main event: An observer reported seeing a drifting silver object with flashing lights, which was evaluated as a probable balloon.
interesting points: The object was observed for over one minute,There were no radar contacts detected with the object,Multiple aircraft in the vicinity confirmed the sighting,The balloon was described as being constructed of a thin translucent silver material,The sighting occurred at nearly 15,000 feet altitude and was drifting at a slow speed.
